message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. It's a one-time opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to let it go for $15000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand you're interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $14000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I can see you're willing to stretch your budget, so I'll make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I've already made significant concessions, but I'm willing to make one more effort to close the deal. However, I need to be realistic about the value of the product. I can offer it to you for $14000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12500?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I've already made significant concessions. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to be at a price that makes sense for me. I can offer it to you for $13500.
